title: Xiaomi 12 Pro Review: The hot flagship living in the shadow of an Ultra
content:
In the first three months of 2022, we have already seen some excellent, very refined flagships in the Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra and OPPO Find X5 Pro. Both phones offer a brilliant 120Hz LTPO gen 2 OLED display, awesome cameras, and the most powerful processor in Android (well, some Galaxy S22 Ultras do, anyway). But

The post Xiaomi 12 Pro Review: The hot flagship living in the shadow of an Ultra appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Xiaomi's 12 Pro is a polished flagship phone, but it suffers from overheating issues and the shadows of a presumed Xiaomi 12 Ultra.
